entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is described as a large man who is lying on the ground after being hit by something.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who had attacked Hagrid and Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is injured alongside Hagrid in the attack by Voldemort.
Voldemort attacked Hagrid, causing him to be lying on the ground.
